high_descs: Turn right and head across the room to the desk in the corner of the room
Pick up the square bowl that is sitting on the desk
Turn around and head forward, take a left at the couch and head forward to the night stand on the right side of the bed
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the night stand
anns.task_desc: Look at a bowl by the light of a lamp

high_descs: Turn right then head straight back to the left hand side of the desk
Pick up the grey bowl on top of the desk
Carry the grey bowl to the right side of the bed where the night stand is with the lamp on top of it
anns.task_desc: Carry a bowl while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the desk to your left.
Grab the bowl on the desk.
Carrying the bowl, turn around and walk to the small table next to the bed to your left.
Carrying the bowl still, turn on the lamp on the small table.
anns.task_desc: With a bowl in hand, turn on the lamp on the small table.
